Apprentice Atra:
You haven't hunted enough to honor Eva's gifts. Kill Mucrokian Fanatics, Mucrokian Ascetics, Mucrokian Saviors, Mucrokian Prophets, Contaminated Mucrokians, and Awakened Mucrokians. To advance our cause, collect Mucrokian Hide. In the process, you will learn to distinguish Quality Mucrokian Hide. Bring those back to me, and the movement will happily reward you.
Collect as many as you can. If you bring enough, I will exchange them for Dynasty accessory recipes.
